package.name: xesc_driver
package.description:
Generic XESC motor controller driver for ROS2.
This package provides a factory/wrapper driver that selects the appropriate ESC driver implementation based on configuration. Supports: - VESC motor controllers (xesc_mini / vesc) - RP2040-based ESC (xesc_2040) [TODO] - YardForce R4 ESC (xesc_yfr4) [TODO]
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
